channel.title: Business Pain Signals Feed
channel.description: Latest business pain signals across operations, outages, and update issues.

item.title: Microsoft 365 outage causes widespread disruption
item.description: Widespread Microsoft 365 outage caused by service problems leading to 15,000 user reports and extended downtime across Outlook, Defender, and Purview services. High severity.

item.title: Verizon software issue triggers major network outage
item.description: Major network outage due to a software issue at Verizon triggered over 2.3 million user reports and prompted FCC investigation. Medium revenue impact, high customer impact.

item.title: Windows 11 security update causes shutdown and hibernation failures
item.description: Windows 11 January 13 security update caused shutdown and hibernation failures on certain devices with Secure Launch enabled, requiring a follow-up fix. Medium severity.
